channel.title: Want to write a server, how i learn?
channel.description: I have some prior experiance in coding, VERY VERY VERY little though, just slightly touching the surface. Can anybody tell me where i learn coding to make a server? i really would like to, as i LOVE this game, and want to be admin in a server, and create a REALLY good server someday. Can anybody help me?

item.title: Want to write a server, how i learn?
item.dc:creator: @Rammer124 Rammer124
item.description:
@Rammer124 wrote:

thank you very much, i will!!! be on the lookout for my server someday!

Read full topic
item.source: Want to write a server, how i learn?
